page.title: 04The North Wales Hospital
page.content: The Hospital est.{1848}was purpose built for{mentally ill}of North Wales. There has been a gradual decline since the 60's in the patient population - {1960-1500 1985-500;}since care in the community became a reality. Several special units have been established. {Mother and Baby Unit (Gwynfryn):}For mothers who become ill during the first 12 monthe following child birth. {Alcoholic Unit:}Principle on the wards is total abstinence from drink.Support from various groups including Alcoholics Anonymous. {Drug Addiction Unit:}Opened 1984 and currently has 8 patients for 12 weeks. {Adolescent Unit:}Caters for the sociopathic and psychopathic adolesc- -ents.Long term admission 1-2 years. {Medium Secure Unit:}For more disturbed patients and those refered from Remand Centres.
